Package org.apache.xerces.dom3

Interface Summary
DOMConfiguration DOM Level 3 WD Experimental: The DOMConfiguration interface represents the configuration of a document and maintains a table of recognized parameters.
DOMError DOM Level 3 WD Experimental: The DOM Level 3 specification is at the stage of Working Draft, which represents work in progress and thus may be updated, replaced, or obsoleted by other documents at any time.
DOMErrorHandler DOM Level 3 WD Experimental: The DOM Level 3 specification is at the stage of Working Draft, which represents work in progress and thus may be updated, replaced, or obsoleted by other documents at any time.
DOMImplementationList The DOMImplementationList interface provides the abstraction of an ordered collection of DOM implementations, without defining or constraining how this collection is implemented.
DOMImplementationSource DOM Level 3 WD Experimental: The DOM Level 3 specification is at the stage of Working Draft, which represents work in progress and thus may be updated, replaced, or obsoleted by other documents at any time.
DOMLocator DOM Level 3 WD Experimental: The DOM Level 3 specification is at the stage of Working Draft, which represents work in progress and thus may be updated, replaced, or obsoleted by other documents at any time.
TypeInfo The TypeInfo interface represent a type referenced from Element or Attr nodes, specified in the schemas associated with the document.
UserDataHandler DOM Level 3 WD Experimental: The DOM Level 3 specification is at the stage of Working Draft, which represents work in progress and thus may be updated, replaced, or obsoleted by other documents at any time.
